channel.title: Is a touch screen computer worth it?
channel.description: I sold my bank on runescape so I now have money to buy another computer. I went to best buy 2 days ago and I saw touch screen computers. I was really impressed with them and I think I may buy one. Is it worth getting or do any of you guys have one and have problems with it?

item.title: Is a touch screen computer worth it?
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

I own a touch screen stove top. Trust me, nothing touch screen is ever worth the trouble.

Read full topic
item.source: Is a touch screen computer worth it?

item.title: Is a touch screen computer worth it?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

marcbob:

Well I bought it And it’s kickass

I thought about the addon for my laptop to add touchscreen (it replaces my entire screen, not a cover) for photoshop. Instead I ordered a penpad thing and use that. Way cheaper lol.

Read full topic
item.source: Is a touch screen computer worth it?

item.title: Is a touch screen computer worth it?
item.dc:creator: @ouadie ouadie
item.description:
@ouadie wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:11, topic:399531”][quote author=ouadie link=topic=496661.msg3632512#msg3632512 date=1308346641]
1.If your computer falls 1x its death or you must be lucky and someone can make it for you (Costs money :|)
2.if the touchscreen falls 2x he is death and it cant be repaired (its liking as spending your money out for free!)
3.If you touch too hard its death(even not fine :o )
4.If it falls it is death and you gived all your money out for a Touchpoop computer

I say No…
better you can get a normal Desktop Computer they are fine
[/quote]

I don’t think they break that easily and it’s not often that my desktop just falls -.-[/quote]

A touch screen is sensitive and if it falls or if he pressed too hard on the touch screen its completely destroyed

Read full topic
item.source: Is a touch screen computer worth it?

don’t flam on me its your choice.[/quote]

item.title: Is a touch screen computer worth it?
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:4, topic:399531”][quote author=marcbob link=topic=496661.msg3631294#msg3631294 date=1308248860]

Depends on what you want it for.

General use. Play some games on it, watch videos, etc. Won’t be always using just the touch screen feature, it’s like a bonus.
[/quote]Touch screen is better for graphic work, easier to draw with a touch screen. If you just want it for general use it seems like a waste imo.[/quote]

If I didn’t get a touchscreen comp I would probably just get a boring laptop. Touchscreen just seems like fun.

Read full topic
item.source: Is a touch screen computer worth it?
